DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate post-operative pain in single-incision laparoscopic cholecystectomy (SILC) versus the conventional four port technique (LC). The investigators hypothesize that SILC is non-inferior in post-operative pain.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Pain in Single-incision Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Versus Conventional Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: presence of symptomatic gallstones American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) score 1 or 2 informed consent active acute cholecystitis previous open upper abdominal surgery bleeding disorders
